text: vaastav mein, tumhaara paalanahaar vahee allaah hai, jisane aakaashon tatha dharatee ko chhah dinon mein utpann kiya, phir arsh (raaj sinhaasan) par sthir ho gaya. vahee vishv kee vyavastha kar raha hai. koee usake paas anushansa (sifaarish) nahin kar sakata, parantu usakee anumati ke pashchaat. vahee allaah tumhaara paalanahaar hai, atah usee kee eebaadat (vandana)[1] karo. kya tum shiksha grahan nahin karate
